Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Axe
Description: Beautiful and unusual example of a granite axe, polished on the faces of the cutting edge and on one face for the remainder of the axe. The conical grip has been rounded. The width of 5,7 cm is that measured at the widest section of the axe, above the cutting edge. The narrowest section measures 3 cm and the maximum thickness is also 3 cm.
